content.question: Which of the following best captures the significance of the image?

choices.label: African American women could work in scientific fields before they were given the right to vote.
African American women began participating in the sciences after the integration of public universities.
African American women have made important contributions to science and technology.
African American women lobbied Congress to allow Black women to become astronauts.

content.answer: African American women have made important contributions to science and technology.

topic.text: 4.20: Science, Medicine, and Technology in Black Communities

skill.text: 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
